comment: Whenever I go to record a video I hold down the record button and it zooms in Automatically and it's just frustrating to record videos . SMH
scenarios: Go to record a video, hold down the record button, and it zooms in automatically, making it frustrating to record videos.
key sentence: Go to record a video, hold down the record button, and it zooms in automatically, making it frustrating to record videos.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to record and enhance videos, adjust playback speed, add effects, sound, text, music, and post videos.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Record video', 'description': 'Record a video'}, {'name': 'Add sound', 'description': 'Add sound to the video'}, {'name': 'Flip', 'description': 'Flip the camera'}, {'name': 'Effects', 'description': 'Add effects to the video'}, {'name': 'Upload', 'description': 'Upload the video'}, {'name': 'Speed', 'description': 'Adjust the speed of the video'}, {'name': 'Retouch', 'description': 'Retouch the video'}, {'name': 'Mic', 'description': 'Enable or disable microphone'}, {'name': 'Filters', 'description': 'Apply filters to the video'}, {'name': 'Timer', 'description': 'Set a timer for recording'}, {'name': 'Flash', 'description': 'Enable or disable flash'}, {'name': 'Close', 'description': 'Close the current screen'}, {'name': 'Text', 'description': 'Add text to the video'}, {'name': 'Camera', 'description': 'Switch between front and back camera'}, {'name': 'Templates', 'description': 'Choose a template for the video'}]
